lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Watanabe said about 10 pct of Japanese investment in foreign securities goes to Canada, ranking second to the United States which receives about 50 pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daiwa Securities Co Ltd, of Tokyo, plans to open a new Canadian company after a June 30 deregulation of the Ontario equity market is implemented, Daiwa Securities general manager for Canada Hajimu Watanabe told Reuters in reply to query.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japanese institutional investors are trying to diversify to other non-American vehicles, and there are very few candidates that remain safe investment objects, Daiwa's Watanabe added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Watanabe said about 10 pct of Japanese investment in foreign securities goes to Canada, ranking second to the United States which receives about 50 pct.
